    <!-- Quora Pixel Code (JS Helper) -->

    <script>

        !function (q, e, v, n, t, s) {

            if (q.qp) return;

            n = q.qp = function () {

                n.qp ? n.qp.apply(n, arguments) : n.queue.push(arguments);

            };

            n.queue = [];

            t = document.createElement(e);

            t.async = !0;

            t.src = v;

            s = document.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];

            s.parentNode.insertBefore(t, s);

        }(window, 'script', 'https://a.quora.com/qevents.js');

        qp('init', '686eecd029c34be2bbe8c7a5d7981a34');

        qp('track', 'ViewContent');

    </script>

    <noscript><img height="1" width="1" style="display:none"

                   src="https://q.quora.com/_/ad/686eecd029c34be2bbe8c7a5d7981a34/pixel?tag=ViewContent&noscript=1"

                   alt="Quora noscript"/></noscript>

    <!-- End of Quora Pixel Code -->

<style>

    #zoom-iframe-warp{

    }

    .zoom-thumbnail{

        border: 3px solid #3c9591;

        transition:  all 0.5s ease-out;

        position:fixed !important;

        width: 500px !important;

        height: 500px !important;


        bottom: 0 !important;

        right: 0 !important;

    }


    .zoom-thumbnail > a{

        display: inherit !important;

        position: absolute;

        bottom: 20px;

        left: 0;

        right: 0;

        margin-left: auto;

        margin-right: auto;

        width: 150px;

        text-align: center

    }

    .active-meeting{

        display: block !important;

        z-index: 1000 !important;

    }

    .meeting-connecting{

        display: block !important;

        z-index: 1000 !important;

    }

</style>

<script>

    let qmZoomMeetingChannel = new BroadcastChannel('qm-zoom');


    adjustZoomSize = function (element) {

        var zoomIframe = $('#zoom-iframe');

        parentId = zoomIframe.attr('data-parent-id');

        if (!parentId) {

            return;

        }

        var parent = document.getElementById(parentId)

        if (!parent || (document.getElementById('live-tab') && !$('#live-tab').hasClass('active')) ) {

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').css({

                top: '',

                left: '',

            });

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').addClass('zoom-thumbnail')

            return;

        }

        $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('zoom-thumbnail')


        var rect = parent.getBoundingClientRect();


        $('#zoom-iframe-warp').css({

            position:'absolute',

            width: rect.width + 'px',

            height: rect.height + 'px',

            top: rect.top + window.scrollY + 'px',

            left: rect.left + window.scrollX + 'px',

        });

    }

    $(document).on('page-loaded', adjustZoomSize)

    $(window).resize(function (){

        adjustZoomSize()

        setTimeout(adjustZoomSize,200)

        setTimeout(adjustZoomSize,500)

        setTimeout(adjustZoomSize,1000)

    })

    $(document).on('page-loaded',function (ele){

        var liveSection = $('#live-tab')

        if(liveSection){

            liveSection.on('shown.bs.tab', adjustZoomSize)

            liveSection.on('hidden.bs.tab', adjustZoomSize)

        }

    })


    qmZoomMeetingChannel.onmessage = (event) => {

        console.log(event)

        if (event.data?.event === 'meetingConnecting') {

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').addClass('meeting-connecting');

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').addClass('active-meeting');

            adjustZoomSize();

            $('#zoom-counter').attr('style','display:none !important');

        }

        if (event.data?.event === 'meetingHasBeenStarted') {

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').addClass('active-meeting');

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('meeting-connecting');

            adjustZoomSize();

            $('#zoom-counter').attr('style','display:none !important');

        }

        if (event.data?.event === 'meetingHasBeenEnded') {

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('active-meeting');

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('meeting-connecting');

            adjustZoomSize();

        }

        if (event.data?.event === 'leaveOtherMeetings') {

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('active-meeting');

            $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('meeting-connecting');

            adjustZoomSize();

        }

        if (event.data?.event === 'still_long_time') {

            if (!$('#zoom-iframe-warp').hasClass('active-meeting')) {

                $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('active-meeting');

                $('#zoom-iframe-warp').removeClass('meeting-connecting');

                adjustZoomSize();

                up.reload('#root')

            }

        }

    };


</script>


    <script>

        $(document).on('page-loaded',function (){

            $('#root').show();

            console.log('show')


        })


        $(document).on('click', 'a[href*="code="]',

            function (e) {

                e.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default link behavior

                window.open($(this).attr('href'), "window-python").focus();


                return false;

        })


        up.on('up:link:follow', function(event, link) {


                        

            if(link.classList.contains('btn') || link.classList.contains('nav-item-link')){

                if(!link.classList.contains('no-spinner')){

                    var size = document.defaultView.getComputedStyle(link);

                    link.style.height = size.height;

                    link.style.width = size.width;

                    var height = parseFloat(size.height.replace('px',''))/2;

                    link.innerHTML = '<span class="w-100 text-center " style="width:100%; display:inline-block;" ><span class="spinner-border" role="status" style="margin: auto;width: '+height+'px;height:  '+height+'px;"><span class="sr-only">Loading...</span></span></span>';

                }

            }

            var target = event.renderOptions.target;

            if (target !== '#lms-root' ) {

                // $('#root').hide();

                console.log('hide')

            }


            if (window.on_follow_message) {

                if (!confirm(window.on_follow_message)){

                    event.preventDefault();

                    return false;

                }

                window.on_follow_message = null

            }

        })

        $(function() { window.setInterval("keepSessionAlive()", 5*60*1000); }); //5min.

    </script>

    <div id="root" up-main class="dummy-div">


        <style>

            .dummy-div{

                margin: 0px;

                padding: 0px;

                width: 100%;

                height: 100%;

            }

        </style>

        <div id="local-styles" up-hungry  class="dummy-div">

                <style>

    /* TEMP */

    .superxpartToc {color: #3c9591; font-weight:bold; font-size: 1rem;}


    /* TEMP EXCEPTION */

    img[src*="ds-exec-table.png"],

    img[src*="PRayera-table.png"]{

        width:100% !important;

    }


    

    BODY {

        top:0px !important;

        line-height:normal !important;

    }

    

    TABLE TD,

    TABLE TH{

        border-color:#fff !important;

        padding:0 !important;

    }

<!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="6.5" permalink="causality-optimal-intervention"  anchor="anchor139"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" <div class="chapterToc" section="9" permalink="sec-mean-cov-structure"  id="chapterId198"  anchor="anchor198"><span class="chapterExpand" type="chapterToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" <!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="24.6" permalink="shrinkage-blending-assessing"  anchor="anchor530"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" Covariance shrinkage: Ledoit-Wolf</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="24.6.3" permalink=""  anchor="anchor533"><a class="toc-nav" <!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --></div><!-- // .chapterDiv -->

<div class="chapterToc" section="40" permalink="prediction-cov-stationary"  id="chapterId868"  anchor="anchor868"><span class="chapterExpand" type="chapterToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cd"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="prediction-cov-stationary.html" idtogo="868" title="Wiener-Kolmogorov filter" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 40 ]</span> Wiener-Kolmogorov filter</a></div><div class="chapterDiv" id=""><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="40.1" permalink="secc-prediction-prob-subsequent-obs"  anchor="anchor869"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cd"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="secc-prediction-prob-subsequent-obs.html" idtogo="869" title="From regression to filter" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 40.1 ]</span> From regression to filter</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="40.2" permalink="wk-prediction"  anchor="anchor870"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cd"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="wk-prediction.html" idtogo="870" title="Endogenous Wiener-Kolmogorov filter" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 40.2 ]</span> Endogenous Wiener-Kolmogorov filter</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="40.3" permalink="wk-pred-exogenous"  anchor="anchor871"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cd"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="wk-pred-exogenous.html" idtogo="871" title="Exogenous Wiener-Kolmogorov filter" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 40.3 ]</span> Exogenous Wiener-Kolmogorov filter</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --></div><!-- // .chapterDiv -->

<!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="43.3" permalink="basic-geom-sec"  anchor="anchor921"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img <div class="chapterToc" section="45" permalink="optimization-primer"  id="chapterId975"  anchor="anchor975"><span class="chapterExpand" type="chapterToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cg"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="optimization-primer.html" idtogo="975" title="Optimization" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 45 ]</span> Optimization</a></div><div class="chapterDiv" id=""><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="45.1" permalink="optimization-general"  anchor="anchor976"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cg"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="optimization-general.html" idtogo="976" title="Fundamental concepts" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 45.1 ]</span> Fundamental concepts</a></div><div class="sectionDiv"><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="45.1.1" permalink=""  anchor="anchor977"><a class="toc-nav" href="optimization-general.html#x268-135900045.1.1" idtogo="976" title="The optimization problem"  hash="#x268-135900045.1.1"> <span class="sectionNum">[ 45.1.1 ]</span> The optimization problem</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="45.1.2" permalink=""  anchor="anchor978"><a class="toc-nav" href="optimization-general.html#x268-136100045.1.2" idtogo="976" title="Local minimum"  hash="#x268-136100045.1.2"> <span class="sectionNum">[ 45.1.2 ]</span> Local minimum</a></div></div><!-- // .sectionDiv -->

<!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="46.5" permalink="spectral-theorem-continuum"  anchor="anchor1028"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-cn"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="spectral-theorem-continuum.html" idtogo="1028" title="Spectral theorem" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 46.5 ]</span> Spectral theorem</a></div><div class="sectionDiv"><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="46.5.1" permalink=""  anchor="anchor1029"><a class="toc-nav" href="spectral-theorem-continuum.html#x279-142400046.5.1" idtogo="1028" title="Motivation"  hash="#x279-142400046.5.1"> <span class="sectionNum">[ 46.5.1 ]</span> Motivation</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="46.5.2" permalink=""  anchor="anchor1030"><a class="toc-nav" href="spectral-theorem-continuum.html#x279-142500046.5.2" idtogo="1028" title="Mercer kernels"  hash="#x279-142500046.5.2"> <span class="sectionNum">[ 46.5.2 ]</span> Mercer kernels</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="46.5.3" permalink=""  anchor="anchor1031"><a class="toc-nav" href="spectral-theorem-continuum.html#x279-142900046.5.3" idtogo="1028" title="Matrix-valued kernels"  hash="#x279-142900046.5.3"> <span class="sectionNum">[ 46.5.3 ]</span> Matrix-valued kernels</a></div></div><!-- // .sectionDiv -->

<div class="partToc" section="XIV" permalink="factor-models-learning-casestudies"  anchor="anchor1634"><span class="chapterExpand" type="partToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><a class="toc-nav" href="factor-models-learning-casestudies.html" idtogo="1634" title="Data science: factor models and learning" >XIV. ]</span> Principal component analysis of the yield curve</a></div><div class="chapterDiv" id=""><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="67.1" permalink="corr-struct-swap"  anchor="anchor1636"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-ca"></span><a class="toc-nav" covariance</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="67.2" permalink="finite-set-of-times-to-maturity"  anchor="anchor1637"><span <div class="chapterToc" section="69" permalink="default-case-study-intro"  id="chapterId1648"  anchor="anchor1648"><span class="chapterExpand" type="chapterToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" classification</a></div><div class="sectionDiv"><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="subsectionToc" section="69.1.1" permalink=""  anchor="anchor1650"><a class="toc-nav" <div class="chapterToc" section="70" permalink="correlation-shrinkage-homogeneous-clusters"  id="chapterId1659"  anchor="anchor1659"><span class="chapterExpand" type="chapterToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-ca"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="correlation-shrinkage-homogeneous-clusters.html" idtogo="1659" title="Clustering for the stock market" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 70 ]</span> Clustering for the stock market</a></div><div class="chapterDiv" id=""><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="70.1" permalink="hierarchical-clustering"  anchor="anchor1660"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-ca"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="hierarchical-clustering.html" idtogo="1660" title="k-means clustering" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 70.1 ]</span> k-means clustering</a></div><!-- NO CHAPTER OPEN:1 --><!-- NO CHAPTER CLOSE:1 --><div class="sectionToc" section="70.2" permalink="shrinkage-clustering"  anchor="anchor1661"><span class="chapterExpand" type="sectionToc" ><img src="/lab/icons/16-expand.png" class="newIcon16" /></span><span class="navColorIndicator bg-ca"></span><a class="toc-nav" href="shrinkage-clustering.html" idtogo="1661" title="Shrinkage" > <span class="sectionNum">[ 70.2 ]</span> Shrinkage</a></div></div></div></div></div>

    </div>


    

    <div class="nav-tab-container" id="search-tab-content" style="position:relative;">

        <div id="searchBox" class="mr-2">

            <form method="get" action="" id="searchForm">

                <input type="text" id="textSearch" placeholder="Search">

                <button type="submit" id="searchBtn" class="btn btn-teal"><i class="fas fa-search"></i></button>

            </form>

        </div>

        <h4 class="subtitle-md-dark-bold" id="searchTitle"></h4>

        <p id="searchError"></p>

        <div id="divContentGoogleResponse"></div>


        <script>

            // Google Custom Search JSON API using REST

            // Limited to 100 per day for free, 5USD per 1000 queries, limited to 10 000 per day


            var APIKEY = 'AIzaSyBw0br9R9NNagmsfQNvdgPXtrRR7A9J3f0'; // API KEY (CUSTOM SEARCH API, arpmGCSE project from MSt google developer console)

            var CX = '004942150183364374478:ltxirpylpoo'; // CX (I keep it the CSE from AS)

            var iStartPoint = 1; // From with result to start (function param)

            var iEndPoint = 10; // End result (only for displaying from - to)


            // Function that handle JSON array response and pass HTML to divContentGoogleResponse

            // @param response: JSON array

            function hndlr(response) {

                // Empty HTML (this is useful for pagination, to delete all html from divContentGoogleResponse)

                document.getElementById("divContentGoogleResponse").innerHTML = "";


                // Add top portion of result

                document.getElementById('divContentGoogleResponse').innerHTML += 'Total results: <strong>' + response.searchInformation.totalResults + '</strong> | Showing: <strong>' + iStartPoint + ' - ' + iEndPoint + '</strong><hr>';


                // Add result title, links and preview text (10 per page)

                for (var i = 0; i < response.items.length; i++) {

                    var item = response.items[i];

                    // remove domain:

                    var linkWoDomain = item.link.replace(/^.*\/\/[^\/]+/, '');

                    document.getElementById('divContentGoogleResponse').innerHTML += '<br> <a class="gs-title text-darkblue" href="' + linkWoDomain + '" target="_self"><span class="font-size-regular">' + item.htmlTitle + '</span></a><br><a class="font-size-small gs-title text-teal" href="' + linkWoDomain + '" target="_self">' + item.link + '</a><br><span class="font-size-small">' + item.htmlSnippet + '</span><br>';


                }

                // Decide when to show previous page

                if (iStartPoint <= 1)

                    $('#btnPreviousPageGoogleSearch').hide();

            else

                $('#btnPreviousPageGoogleSearch').show();


                // Decide when to show next page

                if (iStartPoint >= 89)

                    $('#btnNextPageGoogleSearch').hide();

            else

                $('#btnNextPageGoogleSearch').show();

            }



            function getDatasGoogleSearch(iStartPoint) {

                    let textValue = $('#textSearch').val();

                    console.log(textValue)

                    $.get('https://www.googleapis.com/customsearch/v1?key=' + APIKEY + '&cx=' + CX + '&q='+ textValue + '&start=' + iStartPoint, function(response) {

                    hndlr(response);

                    document.getElementById('searchError').innerText = "";

                    document.getElementById('searchTitle').innerText = 'Search results for ' + textValue;

                    return true;

                }).fail(function() {

                    document.getElementById('searchTitle').innerText = "";

                    document.getElementById("divContentGoogleResponse").innerHTML = "";

                    document.getElementById('searchError').innerText = 'Error in searching topic, please contact IT support';

                    $('.search-direction').hide();

                    //notificationPopup('Error in searching topic, please contact IT support');

                    return false;

                });

            }


            $('#searchForm').on('submit', function(e) {

                e.preventDefault();

                getDatasGoogleSearch(iStartPoint);

            });


            // Next and previous button behaviour

            $('#search-tab-content').on('click', '#btnNextPageGoogleSearch', function() {

                iStartPoint = iStartPoint + 10;

                iEndPoint = iEndPoint + 10;

                getDatasGoogleSearch(iStartPoint);

            });

            $('#search-tab-content').on('click', '#btnPreviousPageGoogleSearch', function() {

                iStartPoint = iStartPoint - 10;

                iEndPoint = iEndPoint - 10;

                getDatasGoogleSearch(iStartPoint);

            });

        </script>


        <button class="btn btn-teal text-white search-direction" id="btnPreviousPageGoogleSearch" style="display: none;">Previous page</button>

        <button class="btn btn-teal text-white search-direction" id="btnNextPageGoogleSearch" style="display: none;">Next page</button>

    </div>

</div>

            </div><!-- //nav-->

            

            </div>        

        

        <div id="containerActiveDot" style="position:fixed;right:10px;top:150px;z-index:1">

    <div class="mr-2 font-size-small" style="float:left; color:#2f2f2f; " id="activeDotText"></div>

    <div id="activeDot" style="width:20px; height:20px; background-color:#3C9591; border-radius:50%; float:right; "></div>

</div>

    }

</style>

    <div class="col-1">Progress: </div>

        <div class="progress bg-white position-relative border-cf text-black" >

            <div class="progress-bar lab-progress-subbar bg-cf"  data-tooltip-content="Theory: 0m&lt;br&gt;Slide: 1m&lt;br&gt;Animations: 0m" role="progressbar" style="width: 2.1%; background: url(/img/bg_progressbar_stripedwhite.png);" aria-valuenow="2.1" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100">

                <span class="text-black">&nbsp;Theory&nbsp;</span>

            </div>

            <div class="progress-bar lab-progress-subbar bg-cf"  data-tooltip-content="Code: 0m"  role="progressbar" style="width: 0%;" aria-valuenow="0" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100">

                <span style="padding-left:.2rem">Code</span>

            </div>

    <div id="pageInfo"

         pagevolume="THEORY"

         pagesection="50.4"

         pageclass="sectionToc"

         pageid="1150"

         pagesuperxpart="Quantitative finance"
